name: Live. Die. Repeat (Wolfaton, CreatorKris, EsbenLG, Thomas Foucault)
name_original: Live. Die. Repeat (Wolfaton, CreatorKris, EsbenLG, Thomas Foucault)
description:
*** How to play ***

Shoot your enemies and make your way through their portal to destroy it!

*** Controls ***

Playable with 2 game controllers only.

Left joystick - Move

Right joystick - Aim

A / RB / RT - Shoot

*** About ***

Live. Die. Repeat. is a game that was made for the Nordic Game Jam 2019 in 48 hours. This year's theme was "That Again!".

In the game, you are playing as the head of your corruption system. Build towers, pools and houses to develop and conquer the whole map!

Thanks for playing!
